title: project leader
field_content:
what are the educational requirements for a project leader?

  • Masters in Civil Engineering or equivalent in Applied Structural Engineering Sciences
  • Industrial Engineer / Masters in Industrial Sciences - Construction
  • at least 5 years’ experience in an engineering consultancy

what can Establis offer you?

  • an open, stimulating environment, with particular attention to quality, team building and work/life balance
  • all the tools and training you need to be successful in your role
  • realistic opportunities for progression within a growing organisation
  • an attractive salary package

interested?

contact Sarah Vanmaercke on +32 51 43 12 19 or svanmaercke@establis.eu
field_hr_content:
what does the project leader do?

  • sets down the structural engineering concept in dossiers
  • draws up specifications and estimates
  • checks the plans in terms of structural stability and analytical reports
  • maintains external contacts
  • carries out monitoring on site
  • manages the project budget based on estimated hours
  • directs his or her internal team

what are the responsibilities of the project leader?

  • ultimate responsibility for his/her projects
  • clear project communications within the internal team

what is the position of the project leader in the Establis organisation?

As a project leader, you are responsible for your own team, which consists of a structural designer and a BIM designer. You will report directly to the directors.

title: structural designer
field_content:
what are the educational requirements for a structural designer? 

  • Masters in Civil Engineering or equivalent in Applied Structural Engineering Sciences
  • Industrial Engineer / Masters in Industrial Sciences – Construction

what can Establis offer you?

  • an open, stimulating environment, with particular attention to quality, team building and work/life balance
  • all the tools and training you need to be successful in your role
  • realistic opportunities for progression within a growing organisation
  • an attractive salary package

interested?

contact Sarah Vanmaercke on +32 51 43 12 19 or svanmaercke@establis.eu
field_hr_content:
what does the structural designer do?

  • carries out structural design calculations on structures and draws up the associated specifications and estimates
  • draws up structural layouts, reinforcement plans and bills of quantities
  • checks concrete layouts, reinforcement plans
  • provides a clear brief to the BIM designer on the calculations
  • pro-actively reports problems and areas of concern to the project leader

what are the responsibilities of the structural designer?

  • responsible for the accuracy of structural design calculations for the individual elements of the structure

what is the position of the structural designer in the Establis organisation?

As a structural designer, you will work in a team with a project leader and a BIM designer. In this team setup, you report to the project leader.

title: BIM designer for Roeselare
field_content:
what are the educational requirements for a BIM designer?

  • Bachelor in Industrial Sciences - Construction
  • higher vocational education in Industrial Sciences - Construction
  • 3rd degree Technical Secondary Education - Construction Techniques - 7th year

what can Establis offer you?

  • an open, stimulating environment, with particular attention to quality, team building and work/life balance
  • all the tools and training you need to be successful in your role
  • realistic opportunities for progression within a growing organisation
  • an attractive salary package

interested?

contact Sarah Vanmaercke on +32 51 43 12 19 or svanmaercke@establis.eu
field_hr_content:
what does the BIM designer do?

  • draws up structural engineering plans (lay-out, shuttering, reinforcement, details etc) in a BIM environment, based on calculations of the structural engineer and the architect's plans
  • checks plans of third parties (e.g. a manufacturer of prefab elements) to ensure conformity with the structural engineering plans
  • draws up bills of quantities, based on the structural engineering plans

what are the responsibilities of the BIM designer?

  • responsible for the provision of clear and legible plans and bills of quantities, where all structural engineering elements are set out in a straightforward and comprehensible manner
  • identifying problem areas in the plans

what is the position of the BIM designer in the Establis organisation?

As a BIM designer, you will work in a team with a project leader and a structural designer. You will report to the project leader and the structural designer.
